output.sentences: The wedding venue was beautifully set up outdoors.
The bride and groom posed for a picture as I took my own from the side.
I could see the bridesmaids talking about the beauty of the wedding.
When the bride and groom exchanged vows it was perfect.
The pose for the picture at the after party was perfect.
